resources.string: 1. Recent research suggests that which disorder may actually be a type of diabetes?
2. In what year did Eli Lilly and Company begin commercial production of insulin?
3. Name two stars lives with diabetes
4. With type 1 diabetes, the body does not produce insulin. True or false ?
5. Insulin is a natural hormone secreted by which organ or gland?
6. The Greeks believed diabetes was caused by snake bites. True or false ?
7.Type 2 diabetes can cause long-term damage in the ... ?
8. What year was the insulin pump first introduced?
9. Which actor has been the face of diabetes awareness?
10. Diabetes can be cured with diet, exercise, and medication. True or false ?
See how much you know about what do you really know about diabetes by taking this quiz.
Click on the heart and submit the answers !
